home_section_1_description: When decentralized finance meets artificial intelligence, combined with a team of practical fund managers and experts with over 20 years of R&D experience in financial products for Euronext,... a breakthrough investment opportunity emerges.
home_section_1_description_mobile: When decentralized finance meets artificial intelligence, breakthrough investment opportunities arise.
home_section_2_title: Growth +300% in 2 years, preparing for listing!
home_section_2_description: NFT Review Index – exclusive digital asset from the top-notch strategy, built by the former R&D Director of Euronext. Outperforming all indices for over 2 years. Own it now before the public launch!
home_section_3_title: Join the world's leading decentralized financial ecosystem, combining Fintech, AI & Blockchain to create an unprecedented financial revolution!
home_section_3_description: The problem is... no one tells you the simplest way to get started.
home_section_3_slide_1: Do you believe that financial freedom is no longer a distant dream – but something you can reach with just one decision?
home_section_3_slide_2: If there was an opportunity to double your assets in a few months while still controlling the risks – would you seize it or miss out?
home_section_3_slide_3: What would you do if every penny spent each month turned into a passive, safe, and sustainable income?
home_section_3_slide_4: Would you like to retire with a steady cash flow every month – even when you're no longer working?
home_section_3_slide_5: If you could invest today for your child to study anywhere in the world – would you start?
home_section_3_slide_6: Is the money that is 'lying still' losing value every day? Why not let it work for you?
home_section_4_title: Every financial goal deserves a unique roadmap – and we are here to accompany you.
home_section_4_description: Wealth Farming is not just a smart financial ecosystem – it is a personalized strategic platform that optimizes cash flow, multiplies assets, and flexibly adapts to all economic cycles, creating a competitive advantage for investors in both the short and long term.
home_section_5_description: "Review Indexes are no longer a secret on Wall Street. The NFT BEQ Indexes are changing the game!" – John Doe, NYSE expert
home_section_5_tab_label_1: Legal financial NFTs, transparent cash flow
home_section_5_tab_content_1: NEC and Review Index are transparent investment NFTs, with no fixed interest commitments, no dividend distributions – complying with standards that do not classify them as securities, easily auditable and publicly disclosed.
home_section_5_tab_label_2: Dual legal framework - aiming for a global IPO
home_section_5_tab_content_2: Operated by two independent legal entities in the US and the UK, the BeQ ecosystem is ready for IPO through SPAC - paving the way for global institutional investors.
home_section_5_tab_label_3: Integrating RWA - real assets enter DeFi
home_section_5_tab_content_3: Wealth Farming expands into real estate, physical assets, and commodities through the NFTization model – helping real cash flow safely and transparently access DeFi.
home_section_5_tab_label_4: The performance of Index Review has grown remarkably.
home_section_5_tab_content_4: BeQ's strategic indicators have increased by over 300% in 27 months, fully backtested and publicly available on the system – no emotional promotion, only based on actual results.
home_section_5_tab_content_5: The BeQ ecosystem is a comprehensive decentralized financial infrastructure – combining transparent smart contracts, AI asset evaluation, genuine backed stablecoins, and cash-flow NFTs – operating like a digital bank but without intermediaries.
home_section_5b_title: And give the best things to the investors
home_section_5b_description: By joining the Wealth Farming ecosystem, investors can enjoy extraordinary profits and flexible liquidity 24/7 with the Zero Limit policy – freely trading NFT certificates, borrowing with DeFi, and managing digital assets without any restrictions.
home_section_6b_description: Wealth Farming is the world's leading decentralized investment and asset management platform, utilizing Fintech, AI & Blockchain, helping investors generate stable cash flow, achieve sustainable asset growth, and attain true financial freedom.
home_section_6_title: Why do millions of investors choose BeQ Holdings?
home_section_6_tab_label_1: Absolute transparency thanks to Blockchain technology
home_section_6_tab_content_1: Profits, metrics, and cash flows are recorded on the smart contract – no hidden fees, no fraud.
home_section_6_tab_label_2: Trading strategy based on Big Data and AI
home_section_6_tab_content_2: Operated by the AI-assisted Index Review model, which has been tested through multiple market cycles.
home_section_6_tab_label_3: Actual profit, not based on FOMO
home_section_6_tab_content_3: Earn from liquid digital assets, target >75%/year, distributed in USDC.
home_section_6_tab_label_4: No need for in-depth financial knowledge
home_section_6_tab_content_4: Just own an NFT – the system automatically invests, reinvests, and optimizes cash flow.
home_section_6_tab_label_5: Assets can be mortgaged, transferred, or double farming.
home_section_6_tab_content_5: NFT creates a cash flow and can be used for borrowing, staking, or flexible trading.
